title: [Large-Scale] Advanced Social Policy Analysis Course Based on Online Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social policy theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced analytical skills development program for in-service professionals, emphasizing asynchronous interaction via LMS discussion forums.

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more theoretical frameworks when analyzing social policy cases in discussion forums
Learners can submit policy improvement proposals reflecting over 80% of peer feedback
Learners can demonstrate multidimensional problem-solving competencies for policy issues through six weeks of intensive discussion formats
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
